'''Will of the Mysterious Graffiti''' is a quest-exclusive NPC that can be found at [["Masters of the Night-Wind"]]. It is a disembodied entity that communicates through a giant [[Nightspirit Graffiti]] raven painted onto the east side of the cliff. 

The player can communicate with it by sitting on a stool at a small ceremonial site in [[Xalac Vale]]. This is also the location of the [[Viewpoint]] ''[[Viewpoint/Great Nightspirit Graffiti|Great Nightspirit Graffiti]]''; the Viewpoint must be recorded before interacting. After completing ''[[Reflections of a Painted World]]'', it can no longer be interacted with.

==Trivia==
* Prior to completing ''Reflections of a Painted World'', the raven's eye will only move if viewed using the special [[Elemental Sight]] of an [[Iktomisaurus]], [[Masters of the Night-Wind|Master of the Night Wind]], or [[Mavuika]]. Afterwards, its eye movements can be freely seen.
